Deal 5 (7) damage twice.
If the target is not Weak, this card's cost is increased by 1 [E].

cards.description:
Unplayable.
If this card is discarded from your hand,
gain 1 (2) Dexterity.

cards.description:
Apply 2 (4) Poison to a random enemy.
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Always Learn
cards.description:
Add 2 (3) Shivs into your hand.
Whenever you play a Shiv this turn, gain 1 Accuracy.

Gain 10 (14) Block.
Discard all non-Skill cards, then draw that many cards.

then gain as much Block as Poison on the target.
Exhaust.

(Retain.)
If you are not in a Stance, enter Calm.
Otherwise enter Wrath.

(Retain.)
Deal damage equal to the damage of an attack in your hand.

Retain.

Double your Mantra.
Lose Mantra exceeding 10 and draw a card for each.

relics.name: Bloody Claws
relics.description: At the end of combat, heal twice the HP lost on the last turn from cards.
relics.flavorText: Sliding your fingers in makes you so thirsty it's almost unbearable.

relics.name: Fire Wall
relics.description: Whenever you lose Focus, gain 6 Block.
relics.flavorText: Hackers just keep burning their hands on this.

relics.name: Gilt-head
relics.description: Raise your Max HP by 6 for each Key you own and obtain.
relics.flavorText: The gilt-head bream is generally considered the best-tasting of the breams.

relics.name: Pocket Lightning
relics.description: Keep your Mantra in between combats.
relics.flavorText: You kept that from your "I am a god" trip.

relics.name: Prisoner Ball
relics.description: Whenever you draw an Unplayable card, gain 3 Block.
relics.flavorText: What went through your head when you deliberately attached this to your leg ?

relics.name: Seesaw
relics.description:
If every card in your hand is an Attack, they deal 4 extra damage.
If every card in your hand is a Skill, they give 4 extra Block.
relics.flavorText: Why does it have to hurt ?

relics.name: Bottled Ice Cube
relics.description:
Upon pickup, choose a card.
It becomes unplayable but its effects are triggered on discard.
relics.flavorText: The cube floats and flips a lot, it looks extremely slippery.

relics.name: Focus Band
relics.description: If you start your turn without being in any Stance gain 2 Mantra.
relics.flavorText: It doesn't seem to be from that world.

relics.name: Paint Roller
relics.description: When your hand is full, Attacks you play deal triple the damage.
relics.flavorText: If you gather enough paint you can just roll on your enemies.

relics.name: Solar Panel
relics.description: At the start of your turn, if you have a Light Orb gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: I wonder who brought that in the tower, but I'm happy it can have some use..

relics.name: Technique Scroll
relics.description: Every time you play 2 Strikes in a single turn, gain 5 Block.
relics.flavorText: Learning has never been simpler than that.

relics.name: Geode
relics.description:
At the start of each combat, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
Allows Opened Geode to spawn in Boss chests.
relics.flavorText: No one knows what's inside until opened... You could hold immense riches or a plain rock.

relics.name: Smoothed Vajra
relics.description: Upon pickup, obtain a Vajra and an Oddly Smooth Stone.
relics.flavorText: How come no one ever though of that ?

relics.name: Blood Hourglass
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
At the end of each turn,
Against elites and bosses : lose 1 HP.
Otherwise : lose HP equal to the number of passed turn.
relics.flavorText: It could be your blood in here if you don't hurry.

relics.name: Haunted Anvil
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Upon pickup, obtain a unique upgradable Curse.
relics.flavorText: You periodically hear clanks like someone is forging something.

relics.name: Infinite Power
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
If you have a Power in hand you must play it before other cards.

relics.name: Opened Geode
relics.description:
Replaces Geode.
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
relics.flavorText: This one had more than you could ever expect ! NL Show it to the shopkeeper at your own risks.

relics.name: Secret Stash
relics.description: Put your remaining Gold in this relic to gain as much Gold the 3 next times you open a chest.
relics.flavorText: People wouldn't look further than the main loot, what a shame.

mods.description: Improve your Slay the Spire experience with fitting content.
